content: **modernella crochet throw - designed by joanita theron** a beautiful textured modern blanket featuring a variety of texture and pretty stitch combinations designed with a modern twist > this pattern is available as a free > crochet along at the link provided **difficulty level | skills required** adventurous beginner to intermediate basic stitches in simple variations simple repeats color changes shaping and finishing you will need to know basic stitches like single_crochet single_crochet and double_crochet double_crochet special stitches explained and provided in the instructions **materials** hook 4 00 mm g scissors yarn needle **yarn ** vinnis colours dk nikkim 100% cotton 50 grams/119 meters weight dk 11 wpi 3 light approx 1200 grams / 3120 yards / 2856 meters 24 balls a natural x 4 b dunes x 3 c princess aqua x 3 d princess turquoise x 3 e turquoise x 4 f kingfisher x 3 g peacock x 4 **yarn substitute ** using the same type of yarn throughout the project is recommended the pattern suggests dk yarn but you are not limited to this type of yarn any yarn can be used if you take into consideration your sizing for the project will differ **gauge | gauge** gauge is not necessary for this project to be perfect however counting your stitches will ensure a true success of this project **size** final blanket size including border - approx 48 x 48 inches 123 x 123 cm remember if you use/choose a different yarn weight/hook size your blanket will be a different size **helpful tips | hints** with a project of this size it is recommended to weave in ends as you go it is important to count the stitches to ensure success most importantly have fun and enjoy the process let life surprise you **abbreviations us terminology** **pattern support** full pattern support is available from the joanita theron designs facebook group or/and joanita theron designs ravelry group please post a question in the group and remember to tag me i will assist as soon as possible or one of my members will gladly jump in to help for questions relating to permission or usage email joanita@creativecrochetworkshop com ***pattern pdf versions are only available in english unless other languages are specified refunds will not be offered on digital products *** it is highly encouraged that you make a copy of your purchased digital downloads for your back-up purposes only
